doc: /** * Green implementation of regionMatches. * * @param cs * the CharSequence to be processed * @param ignoreCase * whether or not to be case insensitive * @param thisStart * the index to start on the cs CharSequence * @param substring * the CharSequence to be looked for * @param start * the index to start on the substring CharSequence * @param length * character length of the region * @return whether the region matched */
